```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(dplyr)
```

# 8.1 E1 - Use dplyr and pipes. Rewrite the following script.

## mtcars <- data.frame(mtcars)
```{r}
mtcars <- mtcars %>% as_tibble
```

## mtcars[1:5, ]
```{r}
mtcars %>% slice(1:5)
```

## tail(mtcars, 5)
```{r}
mtcars %>% slice(28:32)
```


## nrow(mtcars)
```{r}
mtcars %>% count()
```

## mtcars[ , c("mpg")]
```{r}
mtcars %>% select(mpg)
```

## mtcars[mtcars$cyl == "6","mpg"]

## mtcars[mtcars$cyl == "6", ]
